title: Mission Interstellar
description:
Mission Interstellar has been developed in collaboration with leading US and European theme park design companies and the
 installation & integration is managed by our amazing engineering team.

As you train mind and body for the uncertainties of outer space, th
is quick guide will take you through what’s what. Your navigation screen measures 22 X 15 m and will give you a clear field of vision ahead with a
ll the relevant information displayed alongside. You will be immersed in a capsule 3500 sq. ft. in an area which will account for unprecedented fo
rces and will counter them to keep your journey as smooth as possible. Laser projection makes possible for your display to bear a resolution of 4K
 giving you enhanced clarity with each minute detail out there for you to make calculated decisions.

title: Sky Wheel
description:
Firmly straddling a 443 meters tall building, the Ferris wheel at Wonderla Hyderabad park with a diameter of 30 meters gi
ves riders a bird’s eye view of the park and its surroundings and the city beyond, as it slowly turns on its axis. This Sky Wheel is the 2nd talle
st Ferris wheel in India. Its spacious lifts carry visitors to the top of the tower, to give them a feeling of being on the top of the world. From
 the great height of 80 meters, riders can experience the mesmerizing view of the city. Sky Wheel has become a landmark in Hyderabad that can be s
een from miles around.

title: Adventures of Chikku
description:
Experience the Adventures of Chikku, a state-of-the-art ride that combines a 3D film with physical and environmental effe
cts, in an air-conditioned theatre. Experience the crazy ride with Chikku as he sets out on adventures at Wonderla Hyderabad Park - Top-rated amus
ement Park in Hyderabad. Stay prepared to experience movement under your feet, splashes of water, gusts of wind and movie magic like never before.
 The 3D goggles will introduce the spectators to a new, larger-than-life world.

title: Twist and Shout
description:
This is a highly enjoyable kids ride in Hyderabad for young children where after the riders are seated, the ride takes th
em spinning like a top continuously changing the angle of its pivot. With twists and turns like that, your kid is bound to shout out for more fun.

title: Rain Disco
description:
As the name suggests, rain disco is all about getting wet 'n' absolutely wild. It is a specially created indoor dance flo
or that gives you a multi-sensorial experience, with 10,000 watts of heart stopping hi-fidelity sound, Psychedelic laser lights, and perfectly cho
reographed showers of warm water that soak you in absolute dance-bliss! This attraction features an 'intelligent rain system' that moves to music
- the only one of its kind in India. Head over right now for some unmatched family fun in Hyderabad!

title: Boomerang
description:
Boomerang is a thrilling ride at our Hyderabad water park that will test rider's nerves. The float moves into a closed tu
nnel and then suddenly drops from a height into a large boomerang shaped water slide resulting in a repeated to and fro motion.

title: Pirate Lagoon
description:
Start your new adventure with a splash at Pirate Lagoon. Swim and slide with the pirates as they drench you with bucket-l
oad of surprises. Equipped with tilting buckets, water guns, small slides, stairs and sprinkling water, Pirate Lagoon is equally fun for adults an
d little ones.

title: Fun Racer
description:
Fun Racer is a ride with water slides where you slither down lying prostrate on rubber mats. The downward slide is inters
paced with level portions for a wonderful experience. This ride at our water park in Hyderabad is suitable for people of all ages.

title: Recoil
description:
Wonderla introduces India’s first ever reverse looping Roller Coaster - RECOIL. which will give a whole new experience of
 thrill. This high tech roller coaster is imported from the Netherlands, and has two track ramps that go up to 40 meters. The train climbs one ram
p and  accelerates to 80 kmph in 1 second, before encountering a ‘cobra roll’ and a ‘loop’ in the tracks, climbing the second ramp, again to a 40m
 height, and then doing it all over all again, only this time, it is Backwards!

title: Maverick
description:
Maverick, like the name suggests, is a ride that doesn’t go by the rules. It turns. It twists. It tilts. It swivels. Defy
 the rules of motion and momentum on this 21-seater raft hinged to an independently acting vertical column at either end. When you are on it you’l
l scream for it to stop, but after you are done with it, you’ll want to do it again. Safety harnesses hold you securely in place while the machine
 goes through its unpredictable cycle.
Recommended age: 12 years and above. Not recommended for heart patients or people suffering from high BP
.

title: Equinox
description:
Riders on this ultimate thrill ride sit in outward-facing suspended seats of 5.5 meter diameter that can seat a maximum o
f 25 adult riders. The suspended seats mean that the riders’ legs dangle freely, and each seat has an individual shoulder harness with a lock sens
or. The ring is suspended on a big arm which swings back and forth when driven by powerful motors in a seemingly pendulum motion. Meanwhile the ri
ng with the seats starts rotating on in its axis as well. At its peak, the arm swings at a maximum speed of 70km/h, riders are upside down 16mt ab
ove the ground and experience a multitude of thrilling forces. The entire ride is fully computer controlled and consumes about 140KW of power.

title: Techno Jump
description:
The Techno Jump has 14 spokes arranged around a hub. At the outer end of each spoke is a capsule that can seat three. The
 spokes are raised and lowered hydraulically, while the whole contraption spins like a carousal.
- Recommended age 12 years and above.
- Not
 recommended for heart patients or people suffering from high blood pressure.

title: Mini Pirate Ship
description:
Seat your kids safely harnessed and watch as they gleefully go up and down in the pirate ship. This miniature ship can be
 enjoyed even by toddlers.

title: Kiddies Wheel
description: A miniature giant wheel designed to give your children a taste of real thrill without being half as scary.

title: Coco Cup
description:
Coco Cup is a kids ride which resembles a set of cup and saucer. The ride accommodates 16 kids and covers an area of 8 me
ter diameter.

title: Mini Top Spin
description:
Mini Top Spin will give your kids a joyous experience. The seating platform of this ride rotates in horizontal
axis while the seat remains horizontal while riding.
